gradleOverride._comment: if you wish to override mcmod default version, group and archive base name, change enabled to true, otherwise you can delete the whole gradleOverride section
gradleOverride.version: default is the same as outer scope version

_coremod: remove the _ and put the coremod class here
_accessTransformer: remove the _ and put the value for the AccessTransformer property here
name: Forge 1710 Template
